Text:
I found a small video of her singing on the McCloud episode, search for "Barbi Benton 1975 Ain't That Just the Way" on youtube.

As for the episode she was in on McCloud, I found this on wikipedia: McCloud (1975), playing Shannon Forbes in episode "Park Avenue Pirates"

I hope some of this helps and Thank You for this upload. Hope you find more of Barbi.
